```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(leaflet)
mn_cities <- data.frame(name = c("Minneapolis", "St.Paul", "Bloomington"),
                        pop = c(425403 , 307695, 85578 ),
                        lat = c(44.9778, 44.9537, 44.8408),
                        lng = c(-93.2650, -93.0900, -93.2983))
mn_cities %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircles(weight = 1, radius = sqrt(mn_cities$pop) * 10)
